name: SCIO Diamond Corporation
overview:
SCIO Diamond Technology is a company deeply rooted in values. We believe making the best possible products for our customers and making their buying experience a true pleasure. We believe in the talents and character of our employees and our responsibilities to the communities in which we live and work. It is because of these values that we focus a portion of our resources on giving back. We believe that SCIO Diamond Technology, its employees and its customer can and will make a difference in the world in which we live.

In the future, SCIO cultured diamonds will become an important component of the diamond jewelry market. In the technology area, we anticipate that diamond will become the operating system platform of choice for future technology applications and as an industrial material will become the wear resistant material of choice.
